alert.note: Alert for Chaves; Roosevelt (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 5:11PM MDT until May 31 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... Northeastern Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 510 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Pep, or 30 miles south of Portales, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 5:02 pm storm spotters reported a brief funnel cloud west of Milnesand with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dora, Causey, Milnesand, Lingo, Arch, Pep and Rogers. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
